mapper.insert: insert into tworkindex (sTransactionNum, sDepositorName, sApprovalState, sBusinessEmergency, sCommitTimes, sReturnTimes, sPBCReturnTimes, sCompleteTimes, sUploadLicense, sIfNeedLicence, sBusinessCategory, sAccountType, sBankCode, sPBCBankCode, sBankName, sUpUserCode, sUpUserName, sApprovalCode, sIdentifier, sStartTime, sEndTime, sReviewUserCode, sCheckUserCode, sRecheckUserCode, sRecheckUserName, sRecheckResult, sRecheckOpinion, sRecheckTime, sExpireTime ) values (#{stransactionnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sdepositorname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sapprovalstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sbusinessemergency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scommittimes,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sreturntimes,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{spbcreturntimes,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{scompletetimes,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{suploadlicense,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sifneedlicence,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sbusinesscategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{saccounttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sbankcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spbcbankcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sbankname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supusercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supusername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sapprovalcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sidentifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sstarttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sendtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sreviewusercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scheckusercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{srecheckusercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{srecheckusername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{srecheckresult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{srecheckopinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{srechecktime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sexpiretime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update: update tworkindex set sDepositorName = #{sdepositorname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sApprovalState = #{sapprovalstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sBusinessEmergency = #{sbusinessemergency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sCommitTimes = #{scommittimes,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sReturnTimes = #{sreturntimes,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sPBCReturnTimes = #{spbcreturntimes,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sCompleteTimes = #{scompletetimes,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sUploadLicense = #{suploadlicense,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sIfNeedLicence = #{sifneedlicence,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sBusinessCategory = #{sbusinesscategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sAccountType = #{saccounttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sBankCode = #{sbankcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sPBCBankCode = #{spbcbankcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sBankName = #{sbankname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sUpUserCode = #{supusercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sUpUserName = #{supusername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sApprovalCode = #{sapprovalcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sIdentifier = #{sidentifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sStartTime = #{sstarttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sEndTime = #{sendtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sReviewUserCode = #{sreviewusercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sCheckUserCode = #{scheckusercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sRecheckUserCode = #{srecheckusercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sRecheckUserName = #{srecheckusername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sRecheckResult = #{srecheckresult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sRecheckOpinion = #{srecheckopinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sRecheckTime = #{srechecktime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sExpireTime = #{sexpiretime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where sTransactionNum = #{stransactionnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select sTransactionNum, sDepositorName, sApprovalState, sBusinessEmergency, sCommitTimes, sReturnTimes, sPBCReturnTimes, sCompleteTimes, sUploadLicense, sIfNeedLicence, sBusinessCategory, sAccountType, sBankCode, sPBCBankCode, sBankName, sUpUserCode, sUpUserName, sApprovalCode, sIdentifier, sStartTime, sEndTime, sReviewUserCode, sCheckUserCode, sRecheckUserCode, sRecheckUserName, sRecheckResult, sRecheckOpinion, sRecheckTime, sExpireTime from tworkindex where sTransactionNum = #{stransactionnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select sTransactionNum, sDepositorName, sApprovalState, sBusinessEmergency, sCommitTimes, sReturnTimes, sPBCReturnTimes, sCompleteTimes, sUploadLicense, sIfNeedLicence, sBusinessCategory, sAccountType, sBankCode, sPBCBankCode, sBankName, sUpUserCode, sUpUserName, sApprovalCode, sIdentifier, sStartTime, sEndTime, sReviewUserCode, sCheckUserCode, sRecheckUserCode, sRecheckUserName, sRecheckResult, sRecheckOpinion, sRecheckTime, sExpireTime from tworkindex

select * from tworkindex where sApprovalState = #{approvalState} -- 人民银行录入员
and (sCheckUserCode = #{userCode} or sCheckUserCode is null)
and (sCheckUserCode = #{userCode})
and sBusinessEmergency = #{businessEmergency}
and sPBCBankCode = #{pbcCode}
and sUploadLicense != 0
and sUploadLicense = 0
and sRecheckTime is not null
and sRecheckTime is null
order by sEndTime
desc

select * from tworkindex where sApprovalState = #{approvalState} -- 人民银行复审员
and (sRecheckUserCode = #{userCode} or sRecheckUserCode is null)
and (sRecheckUserCode = #{userCode})
and sBusinessEmergency = #{businessEmergency}
and sPBCBankCode = #{pbcCode}
and sUploadLicense != 0
and sUploadLicense = 0
and sRecheckTime is not null
and sRecheckTime is null
order by sEndTime
desc

select * from tworkindex where
sApprovalState = #{approvalState}
sApprovalState = 4 or sApprovalState = 5 or sApprovalState = 6
-- 人民银行超级管理员
and
sBusinessEmergency = #{businessEmergency}
order by sEndTime
desc
